identificationModule.briefTitle: Tenecteplase Reperfusion Therapy in Acute Ischemic Cerebrovascular Events-Ⅱ
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicentre,Open-label, Randomised Controlled, Non-inferiority Trial

responsibleParty.investigatorTitle: President of Beijing Tiantan Hospital, Capital Medical University, Director of Neurology Center

descriptionModule.briefSummary: A Phase Ⅲ, Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized, Open Label, Blinded-endpoint (PROBE) Controlled Trial of Recombinant Human TNK Tissue-type Plasminogen Activator (rhTNK-tPA) for Injection Versus Alteplase for Acute Ischemic Stroke Within 4.5 Hours
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: To test the hypothesis that rhTNK-tPA is non-inferior to alteplase in thrombolysis treatment when administered within 4.5 hours of ischemic stroke onset.

designInfo.interventionModelDescription: multicenter, prospective, randomized, open label, blinded-endpoint (PROBE)，Parallel controls，Non-inferiority

armGroups.label: rhTNK-tPA (0.25mg/kg)
armGroups.description: rhTNK-tPA (0.25mg/kg) is given as a single, intravenous bolus (within 5-10 seconds) immediately upon randomization. Maximum dose 25mg.

armGroups.label: rt-PA (0.9mg/kg)
armGroups.description: 10% dose of rt-PA (0.9 mg/kg) is given as bolus and the remainder in 1 hour. Maximum dose 90mg.

interventions.name: rt-PA
interventions.description: Subjects will be randomized to rhTNK-tPA or rt-PA in a 1:1 ratio.

interventions.name: rhTNK-tPA
interventions.description: Subjects will be randomized to rhTNK-tPA or rt-PA in a 1:1 ratio.
otherNames: Recombinant Human TNK Tissue-type Plasminogen Activator for Injection

primaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of subjects with mRS(0-1) at 90 days.

secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of subjects with mRS(0-2) at 90 days.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS)
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of subjects with NIHSS score ≥ 4 improved compared with baseline at 24 or with NIHSS 0-1 at 24 hours and 7 days.
Quality of life measured by EQ-5D scale.
Global function of daily living defined as BI ≥ 95 at 90 days.
Ordinal distribution of mRS at 90 days.

otherOutcomes.description: Proportion of subjects with symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage (sICH) at 36 hours.( defined by ECASSIII)
The incidence of asymptomatic intracranial hemorrhage at 90 days.
The incidence of PH2 intracranial hemorrhage within 90 days (according to SITS standards).
The incidence of any intracranial hemorrhage within 90 days.
The incidence of Systematic bleeding at 90 days.( defined by GUSTO）
Rate of Overall mortality at 90 days.
The incidence of adverse events(AEs) / severe adverse events(SAEs) at 90 days.

overallOfficials.name: Wei Sun
